TEXT: The applicants , PERSON , Mr PERSON and PERSON GPE , are NORP nationals , who were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively . On DATE the third applicant died . The first and the second applicant live in GPE , GPE .
On DATE the third applicant lodged an application with ORG ( Sąd Wojewódzki ) for compensation for damages sustained by her husband in connection with his conviction in DATE by ORG .

In DATE the first and second applicants and CARDINAL other children of the third applicant , lodged similar applications . They based their actions on the PERSON of DATE on annulment of convictions whereby persons were persecuted for their activities aimed at achieving independence for GPE ( Ustawa o uznaniu za nieważne orzeczeń wydanych wobec osób represjonowanych za działalność na rzecz niepodległego bytu PERSON ) .
The applicants submit that the first hearing was held on DATE .
At the hearing held on DATE the court decided to join all CARDINAL applications and examine them together .

On DATE the court held a hearing . Subsequently , the applicants applied to the court to make some amendments to the minutes of the hearing . On DATE the trial court , sitting in camera , ordered the preparation of an expert opinion .
On DATE and DATE the trial court held hearings . The applicants requested the court to amend the TIME of both hearings . The ORG requests were dismissed on DATE .
On DATE ORG gave a decision . It awarded each of the applicants ORG CARDINAL for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage .
The applicants appealed against this decision .
At the hearing held on DATE ORG ( Sąd Apelacyjny ) quashed the impugned decision and remitted the case .
ORG held CARDINAL hearing on DATE .
On DATE ORG gave a decision in which it partly allowed the action and awarded compensation .
The applicants lodged an appeal against this decision but on CARDINAL DATE ORG dismissed it .
On DATE the applicants lodged a cassation appeal with ORG ( Sąd Najwyższy ) .
On DATE ORG dismissed their cassation appeal as manifestly ill - founded .
